dmca.title: Yahoo Forwards Takedown Notice to Critic of Creationism
dmca.body:
From: "Yahoo! Copyright Agent" <[private]@[private]>
To: <[private]@[private]>; <[private]@[private]>
Subject: Notice of Infringement
Date: Wednesday, July 21, 2004 10:50 AM

RE:  durangobill.com

[private] has notified Yahoo! Inc. ("Yahoo!") that you have posted
copyrighted content in connection with your Yahoo!
